mapper.select: select signIn_info.sii_id, signIn_info.tc_id, signIn_info.teacher_id, signIn_info.start_time, signIn_info.end_time, users.user_name, course.course_name, class.class_name, tc.semester, tc.school_id, school.school_name from signIn_info left join tc on tc.tc_id = signIn_info.tc_id left join course on course.course_id = tc.course_id left join class on class.class_id = tc.class_id left join users on users.user_id = signIn_info.teacher_id left join school on school.school_id = tc.school_id where signIn_info.teacher_id = #{userId} order by signIn_info.sii_id desc limit #{pageInfo.pageNum},#{pageInfo.pageSize}
